MOLE SIMULATOR - Quick Start Guide
=====================================

This is a Java-based chemistry education game where you help a mole learn 
chemical elements by identifying them from their symbols.

QUICK START:
1. Double-click "run-mole-fixed.bat" to start the game
2. Or run: java -cp "mole-fixed.jar;lib\AbsoluteLayout.jar" frmHome

REQUIREMENTS:
- Java 8 or higher must be installed
- Windows, macOS, or Linux

HOW TO PLAY:
- A mole will show you a chemical symbol
- Type the correct element name in the text field
- Click "Enter" or press Enter key to submit
- Earn points for correct answers!

FEATURES:
- Shop system to buy items for your mole
- Dictionary with all chemical elements
- Point system based on mole weight
- Educational chemistry learning

TROUBLESHOOTING:
- If the game doesn't start, make sure Java is installed
- Use the batch files for easiest startup
- Check the main README.md for detailed instructions

For detailed instructions, see the README.md file in the parent directory.
